name: Expanded Diet
description: You can eat certain raw ingredients directly for nutrition, based on your diet.

if_action.command: execute rotated as @s run particle item minecraft:wheat ~ ~0.5 ~0.15 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.055 4
execute rotated as @s run particle item minecraft:kelp ~ ~0.5 ~0.15 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.055 4
execute rotated as @s run particle item minecraft:diamond_block ~ ~0.5 ~0.15 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.055 4

else_action.command: execute rotated as @s run particle item minecraft:wheat ~ ~0.5 ~0.15 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.055 4
